warmup.title: Jumping Rope
warmup.explanation: Jump and move your hands like you would do with a rope

warmup.title: PUSH UPS
warmup.explanation: Straight your Back but carefull, dont put your weight on your back

warmup.title: BURPEES
warmup.explanation: Do a squat , then on a plank stance then up and jump

warmup.title: SQUATS
warmup.explanation: Watch your knees have to be behince your foot fingers

exercises.title: jab
exercises.explanation: Dont over extend the elbow, use ur shoulder to cover your face and put some weight on your punch

exercises.title: straight right
exercises.explanation: Use your shoulder to cover your face and put some weight on your punch

exercises.title: left hook
exercises.explanation: Move your hips to make ur punch heavier, cover your chin with the other hand

exercises.title: right hook
exercises.explanation: Move your hips to make ur punch heavier, cover your chin with the other hand

exercises.title: left uppercut
exercises.explanation: move your hips to make ur punch heavier, cover your chin with the other hand

exercises.title: right uppercut
exercises.explanation: Move your hips to make ur punch heavier, cover your chin with the other hand

exercises.title: jab -straight right
exercises.explanation: Make it sound like one punch

exercises.title: jab, straight right, left hook, right hook, left uppercut, right uppercut
exercises.explanation: Make all the moves together slowly, move your hips and your feet

exercises.title: jab, straight right, left uppercut, right uppercut
exercises.explanation: Combine them so the opponent wont see the punches coming
